comments_since_last_sample.body: Omg 😯🥰I love that black wash! You inspired me to do this next time I find a solid wood piece. I've never tried that brand of paint yet. I've used dixie belle, Fusion, and Pittsburgh fast Dry (in my sprayer) . Glad to see you back on here. How much could you list that for in your area?
Like it but with two coats it just looks like a stained piece to me.

Adorable! Definitely my favourite piece so far...I'm a black girl, (did that come out right?) Have been all my life..and this just confirms my obsession for all things black and moody to ground the environment.
That turned out so nice. I was sceptical at first but I loved it.
